div.ab: When someone has pain in their groin, be it a woman or a man: So take an herb that is called "eylarah" and burn it up in the month of May, and wash it very fully with the same water and also with white wine, or with water from (???). So will he heal, with God's help, certainly.
To stop blood in all places: Take a hand(?) from a hare and burn it to a powder, and put it on. So will he heal, certainly.
To make someone urinate on a place(???): Take eggs from ants and burn them to a powder and give him the powder to drink so will he urinate, certainly.
